statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

statistics.name: offensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the offense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot.

article.headline: Watson scores 24 as Loyola Chicago downs Eastern Illinois 89-65
article.description: — Des Watson had 24 points in Loyola Chicago's 89-65 victory against Eastern Illinois on Saturday night.
article.linkText: Watson scores 24 as Loyola Chicago downs Eastern Illinois 89-65
article.story: CHICAGO -- — Des Watson had 24 points in Loyola Chicago's 89-65 victory against Eastern Illinois on Saturday night. Watson shot 8 for 11, including 6 for 8 from beyond the arc for the Ramblers (1-1, Atlantic 10 Conference). Greg Dolan shot 5 for 7, including 2 for 4 from beyond the arc to add 12 points. Patrick Mwamba was 2 of 4 shooting, including 1 for 3 from 3-point range, and went 6 for 7 from the line to finish with 11 points. Tiger Booker led the way for the Panthers (1-2, Ohio Valley Conference) with 12 points and four steals. Jermaine Hamlin added 11 points and six rebounds for Eastern Illinois. Kooper Jacobi also recorded nine points and seven rebounds. NEXT UP Loyola Chicago's next game is Tuesday against UIC at home. Eastern Illinois visits Illinois State on Wednesday. ------ The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.
